Method Detail

log

protected void log(java.lang.String strText,
                   int intType)
            throws java.io.IOException
Writes a text in the appriopriate stream, according to LOG property and to boolError.

Parameters:
strText - the text to print.
intType - specifies the type of log:
  • -1 for an error message;
  • 0 for a message only if a log has been asked;
  • 1 for a message in any case.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

repeatAttributes

public void repeatAttributes(boolean b)
Asks application to repeat attributes while creating new nodes for multiple word terms (term containing one or several special separators) (or not)

Parameters:
b - - true if attributes should be repeated in any case, false if only the first word should contain the attributes.

public boolean repeatAttributes()
Tests whether attributes should be repeated while creating new nodes for multiple word terms (term containing one or several special separators)

Returns:
true if attributes should be repeated in any case, false if only the first word should contain the attributes.

Returns:

isOutputDirectory

public boolean isOutputDirectory()
Tests whether the specified output file name is a directory.

Returns:
true if the specified output file name is a directory, false otherwise.

Always returns false in MorphAdorner.
